name: Rocket’s Persian ex
author: Mitsuhiro Arita

poke_power.name: Night Cry
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, if Rocket’s Persian ex is on your Bench, you may search your deck for a Pokémon with Dark or Rocket’s in its name. Show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Toxic Claws
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on the Defending Pokémon between turns.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
